sentences.sentence: His political opinions have attracted the opprobrium of the Left.
sentences.translation: 他的政治观点遭到左派的抨击。
这一暴行引起全世界的谴责。

sentences.sentence: Its fans perversely enjoy the opprobrium it still attracts, as well as its deeply cryptic side.
sentences.translation: 它的“粉丝”们一反常态地陶醉于它所招惹的责骂中，恰如对其神秘的一面的深深迷恋。
